problem_context:
Consider the following MIPS code sequence:

a: add $t0, $s0, $s1

b: sub $t1, $s2, $t0

c: xor $t0, $s0, $s1

d: or  $t2, $t1, $t0

subproblem.subproblem_question: (5 pts) Identify all the RAW dependencies between pairs of instructions.

answer.solution:
Instruction b is dependent on instruction a ($t0)
Instruction d is dependent on instruction b ($t1)
Instruction d is dependent on instruction c ($t0)

subproblem.subproblem_question: (3 pts) Identify all the WAR dependencies between pairs of instructions

answer.solution: Instruction c is dependent on instruction b ($t0)

subproblem.subproblem_question: (2 pts) Identify all the WAW dependencies between pairs of instructions

answer.solution: Instruction c is dependent on instruction a ($t0)
